text: Aub () is a town in W端rzburg, in Bavaria, Germany. It is southeast of W端rzburg, and northwest of Rothenburg ob der Tauber. It is on the river Gollach, not far from the border of Baden-W端rttemberg. Aub is divided into three parts: Aub, Baldersheim, and Burgerroth. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:W端rzburg (district)
